title: Spend New Year’s Eve with Frederick
seo_title: New Year's Eve | Deals at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: Enjoy newly renovated accommodations in downtown Manhattan and a full American New Year’s Day breakfast in bed.

banner_image.name: Ring in the New Year
banner_image.description: Enjoy newly renovated accommodations in downtown Manhattan and a full American New Year’s Day breakfast in bed... because really, who wants to go anywhere the morning after?
banner_image.caption: Enjoy newly renovated accommodations in downtown Manhattan and a full American New Year’s Day breakfast in bed... because really, who wants to go anywhere the morning after?

description:
Ring in the New Year in the greatest city in the world. Enjoy newly renovated accommodations in downtown Manhattan and a full American New Year’s Day breakfast in bed... because really, who wants to go anywhere the morning after? With a relaxed check out time (2pm) and New Year’s Eve party favors, this package has everything you need to start 2018 right.

 

Enjoy our signature amenities:

  • Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel

  • Frette linens

  • In-room safes

  • Alarm clock

  • Concierge services

  • Valet parking

  • Valet laundry

  • 24-hour fitness room

  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities

  • Pay per view

  • HD Channels

  • Complimentary New York Times newspapers

  • Serafina, Starbucks and Pret A Manger on premises
addon: Book this package and you’ll also receive a $25 American Express Card for each night you stay with us, up to $200.
